title: SotN #45 - Chainlink 2.0 with Chainlink God
description:
This is the first piece of Bankless content focusing on Chainlink. Who better to tell us about the decentralized oracle solution than ChainLinkGod himself?

State of the Nation is live-streamed on Tuesdays at 11am PT.
